full_summary:
# EP913-241282 - **Contaminated Sites Industry Capacity**

## Notice Information

*Tender Reference Number:* [WS4289123408-Doc4290937287](#)
*Tender Status:* Expiré
*Tender Closure Date:* [2024-01-26T14:00:00](#)

## Project Notice

*Notice Type:* Request for Information (RFI)
*Tender Description:* This RFI aims to collect feedback from Industry to gain a better understanding of current capacity in the Contaminated Sites Industry to deliver services on Federal Contaminated Sites.

## Contacts

*Contracting Entity:* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*Address:*

## Additional Information
